scripts.build: pnpm install && pnpm -F babybox-panel build && pnpm -F babybox-panel-backend build && pnpm run clean:dist && pnpm run move
scripts.clean: pnpm run clean:backend && pnpm run clean:panel && pnpm run clean:dist
scripts.move: cp -r './apps/backend/dist' '..' && cp './apps/backend/package.json' '../dist/' && cp './apps/backend/.env' '../dist/' && pnpm install --prod --dir '../dist' && cp -r './apps/panel/dist' '../dist/public'
scripts.win:build: pnpm install && pnpm -F babybox-panel win:build && pnpm -F babybox-panel-backend win:build && pnpm run win:clean:dist && pnpm run win:move
scripts.win:clean: pnpm run win:clean:backend && pnpm run win:clean:panel && pnpm run win:clean:dist
scripts.win:move: mkdir "../dist" && cd "./apps/backend/" && xcopy "./dist" "../../../dist" /s/h/e/k/f/c/y && copy "package.json" "../../../dist/package.json" && copy ".env" "../../../dist/.env" && cd "../../" && pnpm install --prod --dir "../dist" && mkdir "../dist/public" && xcopy "./apps/panel/dist" "../dist/public" /s/h/e/k/f/c/y
scripts.update: pnpm install -g pnpm@latest && git pull && pnpm install
scripts.start: pnpm run update && pnpm run build && cd '../dist' && node '../dist/index.js'
scripts.win:start: pnpm run update && pnpm run win:build && cd "../dist" && node "index.js"
scripts.echo: echo test; pnpm -F babybox-panel echo ; pnpm -F babybox-panel-backend echo
scripts.win:install: npm install -g pnpm@latest && pnpm run update
